abstract: Senator Ted Cruz helped lead an effort to shut down the government in 2013 in an attempt to defund President Obama’s health care law. Now, he is signing up for coverage under it.

headline.main: Cruz, Critic of Health Care Law, Now Seeks to Sign Up

snippet: Senator Ted Cruz helped lead an effort to shut down the government in 2013 in an attempt to defund President Obama’s health care law. Now, he is signing up for coverage under it.
